title: "Chill its just a game"
body: Does this annoy anyone else or infuriates them?

what's the difference between ranked and normal its just 2 modes in the same game so please explain why I should not play lets say ad {{champion:34}} jg in ranked as its just a ranking that dose nothing to your life so please explain to me what's the difference.

The difference is the way in which people have fun, in normals the fun is caused by the actual playing of the game, with the end result not being too important. Hence it is more acceptable to try new things that might negatively impact the outcome of the game, as the actual playing it is more important. In ranked the fun is caused by the achieving of something, e.g. its a lot of fun when you rise to the next rank or tier, and it makes you feel good, this is the difference. In normals you feel good by running around killing bad guys and saving good guys knowing what whatever you do doesn't matter in the long run. In ranked you feel good when you work for something and achieve it.

So a pick like AD jungle Anivia is without doubt less effective than AP mid Anivia, hence it being ok for normals to have fun playing it. but is less ok in ranked where winning is the prime objective and using a pick that is not in optimum power, is then less of an advantage and as such detrimental to the objective of winning. People then don't like this because they are less likely to win and as such not have their fun.

you are not completely right about the rankings. If you do manage to reach the top you have the chance to become pro (earning money) and that does greatly impact your life. Imagine if someone like Faker had an AD jungle anivia, or an AP support talon in every ranked game he played. he would have been significantly less likely to make it to where he is now, not because he is bad but because his team chose to disadvantage themselves by champion pick.

that is taking it to the extremes, but also while it is unlikely that the rankings will have a real world effect on most of us. the enjoyment of rising in the rankings is a good thing.

What about if your favourite TV show was ruined? technically it doesn't matter because it doesn't do anything to your life right? but that doesnt stop you from being sad when it gets ruined.
